title: What are some of the worst K-pop songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wouldn’t say there is a worse song in my opinon, ive heard many great ones, (go stream Seven O’ Clock’s “Hey there” MV btw) but there are some songs that just… well,, are kinda cringe in some lyrics. Let’s take for exmaple SUPERM’s “100”. It’s a very catchy song, and has amazing visuals from each member:        but some of the lyrics made me feel like:  I’m just going to say the lyrics im talking about: “They all want they all want what we got” I mean, I guess it’s true,,. But there a distinct things that make a person unique, that everyone at some point wants to have this characteristic or thing that makes that person special, maybe im just thinking too much about this, but I mean, well yeah, lol. “We go straight to the top” and “you know we taking the crown” May I ask, the crown to what exactly? I think personally fame really means nothing, it’s the music and what message you get from it that matters, and of course, there are many songs like “100” that have lyrics like this, and honestly I think that’s kinda self centered a little bit, but you know, it’s only a song, the members are very funny, and kind, and I love them all <3 These three are the ones that stood out to me, well, in an very cringey way. NOTE: English is not my first language, so I apoligze if some of it doesn’t make sense, I tried to make it as simple as possible 😅 Thank you for reading, and,,…,,  (If you made it this far, here are some memes to (hopefully) lighten up your day:        😁💙 Peace✌️
